dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: People think e-commerce is just about big global players, but actually, regional leaders like Kaspi.kz in Kazakhstan are dominating their markets with incredible numbers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: People think e-commerce is just about big global players, but actually, regional leaders like the website in Kazakhstan are dominating their markets with incredible numbers.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our Kaspi.kz Super App has now reached 8.5 million monthly users, further cementing its market leading position. Our e-Commerce platform, the largest e-commerce business in the country, is seamlessly integrated into our app and our team continues to work tirelessly to improve user experience.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and they've reached 8.7 million monthly users on their Super App—that's a huge chunk of the population.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and they've reached eight point seven million monthly users on their Super App-that's a huge chunk of the population.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our Kaspi.kz Super App has now reached 8.5 million monthly users, further cementing its market leading position.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly, and they've expanded delivery to 56 cities now, which is pretty impressive for a country that size.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly, and they've expanded delivery to fifty six cities now, which is pretty impressive for a country that size.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We have expanded delivery to 54 cities and increased the range of products to almost 400,000.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And the product range is massive too—like almost 410,000 items available. That's… a lot of choice.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the product range is massive too-like almost four hundred ten thousand items available. That's... a lot of choice.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We have expanded delivery to 54 cities and increased the range of products to almost 400,000.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: What really got me was the growth: purchases grew 128% in value and 152% in volume compared to last year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: What really got me was the growth: purchases grew one hundred twenty eight percent in value and one hundred fifty two percent in volume compared to last year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The amount of purchases grew 125%, the number of purchases by 150% compared to last year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Um, and during the pandemic, they became an absolute lifeline for retailers, helping them keep sales up and jobs intact.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Um, and during the pandemic, they became an absolute lifeline for retailers, helping them keep sales up and jobs intact.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the context of retail restrictions related to the coronavirus pandemic, our e-Commerce platform is an essential partner for many companies in Kazakhstan. We are helping our retailers increase their sales, grow their business and retain jobs.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: They're not just working with local brands either—they've got Adidas, Nike, Marks & Spencer…
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They're not just working with local brands either-they've got Adidas, Nike, Marks and Spencer...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Such well-known international brands as Adidas, O'STIN, UGG, New balance, SPORTMASTER, KOTON, ALDO, SKECHERS, Ecco, DECATHLON, DeFacto, Marks & Spencer, Nike, Reebok and many others sell through Kaspi.kz e-Commerce platform.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, and a ton of popular domestic brands like Qazaq Republic and BALAUSA Jewellery. It's a real mix.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, and a ton of popular domestic brands like Qazaq Republic and B A L A U S A Jewellery. It's a real mix.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kaspi.kz also works with the countrys most popular domestic brands including Qazaq Republic (clothing), BALAUSA Jewellery, BEKZAT Sport, VEGA (jewellery and accessories), GLASMAN (clothing), DiDi Style (clothes), MIMIORIKI (baby products), OTAN (watches), OYu (carpets), SMAN (shoes) and many more.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And the ranking by Forbes Kazakhstan together with Baker Tilly—that adds a layer of credibility to their market position.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the ranking by Forbes Kazakhstan together with Baker Tilly-that adds a layer of credibility to their market position.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The TOP KZ Retail E-Commerce ranking is compiled annually by Forbes Kazakhstan together with the international consulting company Baker Tilly Kazakhstan and the Digital Association of Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. It's not just a shopping app; it's like this all-in-one ecosystem that's deeply embedded in daily life there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. It's not just a shopping app; it's like this all-in-one ecosystem that's deeply embedded in daily life there.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Plus, 2.7 million online purchases in just eight months? That's some serious consumer trust.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Plus, two point seven million online purchases in just eight months? That's some serious consumer trust.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For the first eight months of this year, our users made 2.6 million online purchases for almost 200 billion tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And spending nearly 205 billion tenge through the platform—it shows people aren't just browsing; they're buying big.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And spending nearly two hundred five billion tenge through the platform-it shows people aren't just browsing; they're buying big.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For the first eight months of this year, our users made 2.6 million online purchases for almost 200 billion tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: You can tell the integration between the app and e-commerce is seamless, which probably drives that loyalty.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You can tell the integration between the app and e-commerce is seamless, which probably drives that loyalty.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our e-Commerce platform, the largest e-commerce business in the country, is seamlessly integrated into our app and our team continues to work tirelessly to improve user experience.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. It's one of those cases where local innovation really understands its audience.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. It's one of those cases where local innovation really understands its audience.

artist_script:
HostA: People think e-commerce is just about big global players, but actually, regional leaders like Kaspi.kz in Kazakhstan are dominating their markets with incredible numbers.
HostB: Yeah, and they’ve reached 8.7 million monthly users on their Super App—that’s a huge chunk of the population.
HostA: Exactly, and they’ve expanded delivery to 56 cities now, which is pretty impressive for a country that size.
HostB: And the product range is massive too—like almost 410,000 items available. That’s… a lot of choice.
HostA: What really got me was the growth: purchases grew 128% in value and 152% in volume compared to last year.
HostB: Um, and during the pandemic, they became an absolute lifeline for retailers, helping them keep sales up and jobs intact.
HostA: They’re not just working with local brands either—they’ve got Adidas, Nike, Marks & Spencer…
HostB: Oh yeah, and a ton of popular domestic brands like Qazaq Republic and BALAUSA Jewellery. It’s a real mix.
HostA: And the ranking by Forbes Kazakhstan together with Baker Tilly—that adds a layer of credibility to their market position.
HostB: For sure. It’s not just a shopping app; it’s like this all-in-one ecosystem that’s deeply embedded in daily life there.
HostA: Plus, 2.7 million online purchases in just eight months? That’s some serious consumer trust.
HostB: And spending nearly 205 billion tenge through the platform—it shows people aren’t just browsing; they’re buying big.
HostA: You can tell the integration between the app and e-commerce is seamless, which probably drives that loyalty.
HostB: Absolutely. It’s one of those cases where local innovation really understands its audience.
